ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Her answer gave him alot to think about. he knew she was sincere, but on this planet animals didn t help each other without getting something back. Is this all

Her answer gave him alot to think about. he knew she was sincere, but 
on this planet animals didn't help each other without getting 
something back. Is this all his race was,? based on his limited 
knowledge of war and survival Lunarpine knew that one thing is true. 
In war there are no friends, only interests. If this is true then why 
was she being so nice?

Lunarpine took a quick glance behind him, will his new home be this 
way or is there more to his type of beings than he realized.

"I guess you should call for a ride, Your friends wouldn't know my 
voice."Lets go....."Lunarpine trembled at the thought of leaving this 
place for a new life in a strange land,...."Home".

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> (Oh darn, and I was looking forward to a cruise on the Titanic. Oh 
well. For 
> the sake of RPG, they can use a smal transport pod)
> 
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She gave him a funny look. "Why am I helping you? Huh, I guess I 
really 
> didn't think about it.  I don't know for sure.  I guess I'm just 
following 
> my instincts on this one."
> At first she didn't really have a reason for why she was helping 
him.  But 
> now she had a reason.  She was growing fond of him. But he was in a 
class of 
> his own. (another science joke)
> 
> ------Original Message---
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 6:59pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> (According to the AMERICAN version the ARK crashed into MT saint
> Helens, and made it erupt in the 80's when they awoke. In this game
> the ARK crashed somewhere in Tibet.)OH well I guess we'll have to
> book a cruise. As long as it's not aboard the Titanic.
> 
> Lunarpine continued to look at Shadow Wing, was it because of her
> beautiful white feathers, or because of the animal she represented.
> Either way she was out of his class. (science joke.) They shared 
this
> world, this land, this night, and most importantly, this journey.
> 
> "tell me again Shadow Wing, why are you helping me?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
